subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: James McAdoo of Norfolk, Va., scored 20 points, and the tournament most valuable player Brad Beal of St. Louis added 19 as the United States won FIBA’s under-17 championship with a 111-80 victory over Poland in Hamburg, Germany.
snippet: James McAdoo of Norfolk, Va., scored 20 points, and the tournament most valuable player Brad Beal of St. Louis added 19 as the United States won FIBA’s under-17 championship with a 111-80 victory over Poland in Hamburg, Germany.
